Text: Now that the 11g spec is final, and a new firmware has been released supporting it, the WRT54G is a serious contender for your wireless network.  range[+3] ##It's easy and really works, with some incredible range.  Compatibility[+3]  Compatability with other devices is excellent too; I've only found one 11b device that won't work with its mixed mode (and it won't work with *anyone's* mixed mode).  Then this is the way to go.
